task_background: Prepare the KDE hackathon space for the next day's coding marathon by organizing equipment, debugging tools, and cleaning up.

tasks.task_description: Place the USB debugging dongle on the test rack.
Find the heaviest black item on the adjustable desk and place it in the break area.
Use the duster to clean the coffee-stained schematics printout.
Find the largest wooden furniture in the central coding hub and use the rake to smooth its surface.
